TopicTitle: How to check last message or communicate ?

Articles.Content:
I was wondering is there in KSP any kind of log or something like that ? Sometimes i can't catch the messages popping out, like - You are entering (...) sector".

Thanks in advance

Unfortunately, I don't believe so (at least to the best of my knowledge). The game does generate an output_log.txt in the "/KSP_Data" folder, but I don't see anything in there related to gameplay messages -- everything I see right now has to do with asset loading and management.
If you press F3 you get a mission report, but it doesn't show you that information either.

I gather this is about the 'go to this location and do this science' contracts? If you've gone into the map mode and clicked 'target tracking' on the location, it adds a marker to the navball. Then when you're inside the area to do the test, the navball marker flashes, and when u leave it again it stops flashing.

If u don't notice this either it won't help at all, but if it'll give you a lot more time to notice it.

Something else that occurs to me, is u might be able to change the font colour of the message. I don't know where or how to do this, but if it was bright red rather than Kerbal green it wud be much harder to miss.
